appearances.title: U.S. House of Representatives House Tributes to Late Rep. LaMalfa : CSPAN : January 10, 2026 2:54pm-3:59pm EST
appearances.snippet: mike thompson. >> i thank the gentleman for yielding, and i thank you especially for holding this special order for someone who we're all going to miss, a really great guy. and i'm honored to be able to reflect a little bit on the life and the service of an extremely dedicated member of congress, doug lamalfa. i served northern california alongside of doug from the day that he was sworn in to this body, and his area was an area that i represented when i was in the state senate and in congress. we represented neighboring regions of our state. we shared many of the same challenges and worked together on issues that mattered deeply to the people that we both served. i was proud to work with him on bipartisan efforts to support our farmers and ranchers, to strengthen wildfire prevention, to build sites reservoir, and to address the growing home insurance crisis facing families across all of northern california. he and i worked together to deliver over $500 million in tax relief to fire victims in our district that lost their homes, then had to sue in order to get the financial relief to rebui
